solution_line_template: She takes both of those halves and tears them each in half, {halves_per_slice} halves x {pieces_per_half} more halves in half = <<{halves_per_slice}*{pieces_per_half}={pieces_per_slice}>>{pieces_per_slice} pieces per slice of bread.
Melanie is using {num_slices} slices of bread x {pieces_per_slice} pieces each = <<{num_slices}*{pieces_per_slice}={total_pieces}>>{total_pieces} pieces overall to add to the blender.
